title: Zorro's Black Whip 1944 colorized cliffhanger serial

sources.title: Zorro's Black Whip 1944 colorized cliffhanger serial
sources.description: A woman (Linda Stirling) who is an expert with bullwhip and pistol dons a black costume and mask to become the avenging crusader "The Black Whip" (stuntwoman Helen Thurston) after her brother, owner of the town's newspaper, is murdered by the greedy owner of the stagecoach line. She gets help from a government agent (George J. Lewis). A colorized 12-chapter Republic cliffhanger serial
